definition: broken/damaged/worn out/lousy/rotten/to break, split or cleave/to get rid of/to destroy/to break with/to defeat/to capture (a city etc)/to expose the truth of
cloth/to declare/to announce/to spread/to make known

sentences.english: They never ignore any tatters, even an iron piece would bring them crazy joyous.
sentences.chinese: 破布烂衫不放过，碰上铁器喜如狂。

sentences.english: All my righteousness is like filthy rags.
sentences.chinese: 我所有的正义都像肮脏的破布。

sentences.english: The blisters were starting to burst open and their skin hung down like rugs.
sentences.chinese: 水泡破裂开，伤口的皮肤像破布一样悬挂着。

sentences.english: He plugged the hole in the pipe with an old rag.
sentences.chinese: 他用一块旧破布把管子上的那个洞塞住了。

sentences.english: Cleaned rags and straw are further conveyed to the digesters.
sentences.chinese: 除尘后的破布和稻麦草再被带式运输机送入蒸煮设备。

sentences.english: Napoleon bragged that he could train men to sacrifice their lives for a scrap of ribbon.
sentences.chinese: 拿破仑吹嘘道他可以训练人们为了块破布而献出生命。

sentences.english: They can manufacture rags into paper.
Spontaneous combustion ignited the heap of oil-soaked rags in the basement.
sentences.chinese: 自燃使得地下室渍油的破布堆燃烧起来了。

sentences.english: The ragged ma fantastic drags a waggon of rag fragments.
sentences.chinese: 那个衣不蔽体的人拉着一货车破布碎片。

sentences.english: Wet a rag with a solvent such as nail polish remover and rub away stains.
sentences.chinese: 用洗甲水将破布弄湿，而后将污点除去。

sentences.english: He was wiping his hands on a rag.
I keep these rags for cleaning the car.
sentences.chinese: 我把这些破布留着擦车用。

sentences.english: A mask with a frayed cord was fastened over the woman's face.
sentences.chinese: 女人的脸上套着一个面罩，用破布带子系着。

sentences.english: We can use old cloths to dip into paint and print interesting patterns.
sentences.chinese: 我们可以用破布蘸到颜料里印出有趣的图案。

sentences.english: His feet were coverd with rags, red with the blood of long marches.
sentences.chinese: 他的脚上缠着破布，布上浸透着长途跋涉留下的鲜血。

sentences.english: His feet were covered with rags, red with the blood of long marches.
sentences.chinese: 他的脚上缠着破布，布上浸透着长途跋涉留下的鲜血。

definition: a piece, scrap or fragment of paper
cloth and silk/cotton and silk textiles
